sentences.en: If we examine this entity holistically, we can discover how incredible it really is.
sentences.cn: 如果我们整体检查这实体, 我们可以发现它真的是多么让人难以置信.

sentences.en: Menu items and dialogs , when they are translated, to be considered holistically.
sentences.cn: 在翻译菜单项和对话框时, 需要全盘考虑,确保翻译的界面保持整体的一致性很重要.

sentences.en: Menu items and dialogs, when they are translated, need to be considered holistically. It is important to make sure that translated interfaces remain coherent as a whole.
sentences.cn: 在翻译菜单项和对话框时，需要全盘考虑，确保翻译的界面保持整体的一致性很重要。

sentences.en: One - of demoulding several bricks holistically, which realized concentrical portage and stroking, improves production efficiency.
sentences.cn: 一次性数块整体出模, 实现了集中搬运码垛, 提高了生产效率.

sentences.en: This lets us see more of the whole picture, look at problems more holistically, and take corrective action sooner.
sentences.cn: 这使得我们可以看到更多的整体画面，更轻松地查看问题，更快地采取适当的行动。

sentences.en: With the addition of meridian or Chinese Massage, one would benefit holistically in this album.
sentences.cn: 若宁听此专辑,加配合筋络或穴道按摩, 一定使那整体疗程更加深刻,丰富.

trans.tran_cn: holistic（整体的，全盘的）的副词形式
